articles.title: Shooting suspect Stephen Broderick caught near Manor, authorities say; 2 victims identified - Austin American-Statesman
articles.description: Broderick was taken into custody after officials received a 911 call about a man walking along U.S. 290 near Manor. He was arrested without incident.
articles.content:
Authorities have arrested 41-year-old Stephen Broderick, whom authorities have accused of fatally shooting three people in Northwest Austin on Sunday.

articles.title: Samsung toppled in Africa by little known Chinese smartphone brand - Android Authority
articles.description: Samsung continues to lag behind Apple in North America, and now it's lost Africa too.
articles.content:
• According to a new report, Samsung is no longer the top smartphone brand in Africa.

articles.title: US fashion brand Abercrombie & Fitch to close Singapore store on May 2 - TODAYonline
articles.description: SINGAPORE — American casual wear brand Abercrombie & Fitch said on Monday (April 19) that it will close its physical Singapore store on May 2. The firm arrived here amid some controversy less than a decade ago.
